Detector.Details: Original detector to detect HC_MISSING_EQUALS_HASHCODE bug pattern.

MessageCollection.BugCode: My SpotBugs BugCode for hashcode/equals problem

BugPattern.description: Class used in hash-based collection without equals/hashCode
BugPattern.detail: This class is inserted into a HashSet/HashMap but does not override both equals and hashCode.
BugPattern.ShortDescription: Class used in hash-based collection without equals/hashCode
BugPattern.LongDescription: This class is inserted into a HashSet/HashMap but does not override both equals and hashCode.
BugPattern.Details: Explain existing problem in code, and how developer should improve their implementation.
